WorkflowInfo.Name: Create servers status report
WorkflowInfo.Description: The report includes CPU usage, memory usage, disk space usage and service status
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:CreateMemoryTable;Assembly=CreateMemoryTable, Version=1.3.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:CreateMemoryTable IsValid="True" x:Name="createMemoryTable1" ColumnNumber="6" TableName="StatusReport" RowNumber="1" isEmptyGrid="0" Description="Creates a memory table." DisplayName="Create Memory Table" TypeName="CreateMemoryTable" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="resultSet" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="resultSet">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="Server_x0020_Name" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="CPU_x0020_Usage" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Memory_x0020_Usage" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Drive_x0020_C_x0020_Usage" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="Service_x0020_Status" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema>
 <resultSet>
 <Server_x0020_Name />
 <Status />
 <CPU_x0020_Usage />
 <Memory_x0020_Usage />
 <Drive_x0020_C_x0020_Usage />
 <Service_x0020_Status />
 </resultSet>
</NewDataSet>" /> <ns1:ReadXLS IsValid="True" x:Name="readXLS1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Read Excel" Path="c:\servers.xls" Password="" Description="Read excel file" HostId="1" TypeName="ReadXLS" UserName="" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns5:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /> <ns2:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="CurrRow" ResultSet="%StatusReport%" ResultSetName="StatusReport" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <ns6:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="ServerName" ColumnNumber="1" ResultSet="%readXLS1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="readXLS1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns7:Ping IsValid="True" x:Name="ping1" TimeInSeconds="60" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="%ServerName%" DisplayName="Ping" Description="Run a Ping command line" HostId="-2" TypeName="Ping" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns9:ReturnValue Value="Success" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Success)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:CPU IsValid="True" x:Name="cpu1" HostName="%SreverName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="CPU" DisplayName="Get CPU" Password="" Description="Get the selected CPU information" HostId="-2" SelectedDeviceStatus="Average Usage" UserName="" /> <ns11:Memory IsValid="True" x:Name="memory1" HostName="%SreverName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="Memory" DisplayName="Get Memory" Password="" Description="Get the selected Memory information" HostId="-2" SelectedDeviceStatus="Usage" UserName="" /> <ns12:DiskSpace IsValid="True" x:Name="diskSpace1" HostName="localhost" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" TypeName="DiskSpace" DisplayName="Get Disk Space" Path="c:" Password="" Description="Get the selected disk space information" HostId="1" SelectedDeviceStatus="Available %" UserName="" /> <ns13:ServiceStatus IsValid="True" x:Name="serviceStatus1" HostName="%ServerName%" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="Get Service Status" ServiceName="Spooler" Password="" Description="Gets the selected service status." HostId="-2" TypeName="ServiceStatus" UserName="" /> <ns14:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="3" NewValue="%cpu1%" RowNumber="%CurrRow%" VariableName="%StatusReport%" x:Name="setCellValue2" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns14:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="4" NewValue="%memory1%" RowNumber="%CurrRow%" VariableName="%StatusReport%" x:Name="setCellValue3" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns14:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="5" NewValue="%diskSpace1%" RowNumber="%CurrRow%" VariableName="%StatusReport%" x:Name="setCellValue4" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> <ns14:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="6" NewValue="%serviceStatus1%" RowNumber="%CurrRow%" VariableName="%StatusReport%" x:Name="setCellValue5" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns9:ReturnValue Value="Failure" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionType="" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=Equals(&&&,Failure)" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="StoredValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns14:SetCellValue IsValid="True" ColNumber="2" NewValue="no ping" RowNumber="%CurrRow%" VariableName="%StatusReport%" x:Name="setCellValue1" Description="Set a new value to a result set." DisplayName="Set Cell Value" TypeName="SetCellValue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> <ns8:AddMemoryTableRow Selection="2" IsValid="True" x:Name="addMemoryTableRow1" ResultSet="%StatusReport%" RowNumber="" NumberOfRows="1" ResultSetName="StatusReport" Description="Add a memory table row." DisplayName="Add Row to Memory Table" TypeName="AddMemoryTableRow" /> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns3:ConvertToHTMLTable DisplayName="Convert to HTML Table" x:Name="convertToHTMLTable1" TypeName="ConvertToHTMLTable" Description="Convert a ResultSet to an HTML table." IsValid="True" Value="%StatusReport%" /> <ns4:SendEmail Channel="0" TimeInSeconds="0" Subject="Servers status report" DestinationNumber="1" TemplateNumber="0" ShiftLevel="" IsValid="True" HostId="0" TemplateName="" TypeName="SendEmail" SendRN="False" x:Name="sendEmail1" DestinationTypeCc="User" DestinationType="User" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:00:00" DisplayName="Send Email" Attachments="" Cc="" Description="Send an email to a user, a group or a duty." Continue="False" DestinationNumberCc="0" Body="<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0 Transitional//EN">
